concept.title: Types of Personal Training Packages
concept.shortdesc: There are many different packages available, so you can pick the best one that meets your needs. Packages can be for a year or a semester.

conbody.p:
Yearly packages:
24 sessions cost $366, which is equal to $15.25 per session.
32 sessions cost $480, which is equal to $15 per session.

Semester packages:
A single session, which is only available to renewing clients, costs $16.50.
2 sessions (orientation package), which includes a fitness assessment and another session, cost $33.
3 sessions cost $49.50.
5 sessions cost $82.50.
8 sessions cost $130, which is equal to $16.25 per session.
12 sessions cost $192, which is equal to $16 per session.
16 sessions cost $252, which is equal to $15.75 per session.
18 sessions cost $279, which is equal to $15.50 per session.
You can also sign up for partner training packages, if you want to train with a friend using the same personal trainer.
